briefTitle: Effect of Ozurdex® 0.7 mg on Improvement of Efficacy of Bevacizumab for Central Retinal Vein Occlusion

armGroups.label: Group 1
interventionNames: Drug: Active bevacizumab and Sham dexamethasone

armGroups.label: Group 2
interventionNames: Drug: Active bevacizumab and Active dexamethasone

outcomeMeasures.title: The Primary Efficacy Endpoint is the Total Number of PRN Bevacizumab Intravitreal Injections Through 24 Weeks
The Secondary Efficacy Endpoint is the Visual Acuity Score Based on Best Corrected Visual Acuity (BCVA) at Week 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in BCVA at Week 24 from baseline
